resources.string: Welcome to the Table Tennis Technique app which allows to track stroke counts and acceleration during practice sessions. This is a phone companion for the wear app
You have no Wear devices linked to your phone at this time.
Checking your Wear devices for app..\n
You are missing the Wear app on all your Wear devices, please click on the button below to install it on those device(s).\n
Open the Table Tennis Technique app on your wearable device and start your practice!
Table Tennis Technique Wear app installed on some your device(s). You can now use it on your Wearable device. To install this Wear app on the other devices, please click on the button below.
Play Store Request Failed. Wear device(s) may not support Play Store.
Play Store Request successfully sent to Wear device.
